subject: malt's international quikscript project- progress report
msgSnippet: Hello all, I have just uploaded more files and updated the others of my International Quikscript project for those interested. The proposal has been updated
messageBody:
Hello all,
I have just uploaded more files and updated the others of my International Quikscript project for those interested.
The proposal has been updated and new rules added as well as old rules refined- see the file AAA-Intro and Notes.pdf for more details.
The hardbasket has grown in size- the words list has expanded and new groupings of words with similar problems have been created. If anyone wants to help determine how these words should be handled please feel free to make a recommendation- eg.you could suggest a new rule for the proposal to handle one of groupings.
I'm currently working on the top 500 lemmatized nouns- about half way. After that I only have the verbs to go till I consider the project basically complete. Then I will then produce some example text using these spellings to see what people think of it- it will probably be an internation QS version of "Through the Looking-Glass, and What Alice Found There" by Lewis Carol. This will be quite awhile yet.
